plot: An insane man locks his dead fiancée's room for 40 years and dies after seeing a vision of her.
title: Dandy Dick of Bishopsgate
plot_es: An insane man locks his dead fiancée's room for 40 years and dies after seeing a vision of her.
plot_en: An insane man locks his dead fiancée's room for 40 years and dies after seeing a vision of her.
